lang: type msgmerge &> /dev/null || { echo 'Please install gettext'; exit 1; }
for p in ./languages/*.po; do msguniq "$p" -o "$p"; done
for p in ./languages/*.po; do msgmerge --quiet -o "$p.tmp" --no-fuzzy-matching "$p" "./languages/aiic.pot"; done
for p in ./languages/*.po; do msgattrib --no-obsolete -o "$p" "$p.tmp"; done
for p in ./languages/*.po.tmp; do rm "$p"; done
for p in ./languages/*.po; do msgfmt -cv --statistics "$p" -o "${p%.*}.mo"; done

scripts-descriptions.lang: Updates the POT file, then updates any PO files, and (re)compiles associated MO files
